#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define D 1000000007
//Algo- Segment tree+ Fibonacci properties

void nthfib(long long n,pair<long long,long long>& ans)
{
    long long a,b,c,d;
    if(n == 0)
    {
        ans.first=0; ans.second=1;
        return;
    }
    nthfib(n>>1,ans);
    a = ans.first; b=ans.second;
    c = 2*b - a;
    if(c < 0)
        c += D;
    c=(a * c)%D; d = (a*a + b*b)%D;

    if(n&1)
    {
      ans.first=d; ans.second=c+d;
    }
    else
    {
       ans.first=c; ans.second=d;
    }
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    long long n;

    while(t--)
     {
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    pair<long long,long long> ans;
        nthfib(n,ans);
        printf("%d\n",ans.first);
    }
}
